zh.app.title: 诺依曼趋势测试工具
zh.app.description: 用于评估数据集是否存在系统性趋势的统计工具
zh.menu.new_test: 运行新的诺依曼趋势测试
zh.input.data_points: 请输入数据点 (用空格分隔):
zh.input.time_points: 请输入时间点 (用空格分隔):
zh.result.table_header: 数据点	时间点	PG值	W(P)阈值	趋势判断
zh.result.conclusion_trend: 数据存在显著趋势，可能表明测试样品在所测量的时间内存在系统性变化。
zh.result.conclusion_no_trend: 数据无显著趋势，测试样品在所测量的时间内保持稳定。
zh.result.test_failed: 测试未能成功完成，可能是因为数据点不足。
zh.help.title: 帮助信息
zh.help.description: 诺依曼趋势测试是一种统计方法，用于评估数据集是否存在系统性趋势。
zh.help.usage_areas: 这种测试常用于药物稳定性研究和质量控制等领域。
zh.help.guide_1: 运行新的诺依曼趋势测试 - 直接输入数据并执行测试
zh.help.guide_2: 加载数据集 - 加载之前保存的数据集并执行测试
zh.help.guide_3: 从CSV导入数据 - 从CSV文件导入数据以便测试
zh.help.note_1: 诺依曼趋势测试至少需要4个数据点
zh.help.note_2: 标准W(P)值基于特定的统计表，用于判断趋势是否显著
zh.help.note_3: 如果PG值小于或等于W(P)值，则判断为存在趋势
zh.help.note_4: 默认使用95%置信水平，可以手动调整
zh.about.title: 关于
zh.about.description: 本工具用于执行诺依曼趋势测试，支持数据管理、测试执行和结果分析。
zh.about.applications: 可广泛应用于药物稳定性研究、质量控制和时间序列分析等领域。
zh.load.run_test_prompt: 是否对该数据集运行诺依曼趋势测试?
zh.prompt.save_results: 是否将结果保存到文件?
zh.prompt.timepoint_mismatch_warning: 警告: 时间点数量与数据点数量不匹配，将使用默认时间点。
zh.help.show_help: 显示此帮助信息并退出
zh.help.process_file: 处理指定路径的CSV数据文件
zh.error.insufficient_data: 数据点不足，至少需要4个数据点
zh.error.missing_file_argument: 错误: 缺少文件路径参数
zh.suggestion.title: 建议
zh.suggestion.check_file_path: 请检查文件路径是否正确
zh.suggestion.check_data_format: 请检查数据格式是否正确
zh.status.calculating: 正在运行诺依曼趋势测试...
zh.status.goodbye: 感谢使用诺依曼趋势测试工具，再见！

en.app.title: Neumann Trend Test Tool
en.app.description: Statistical tool for evaluating systematic trends in datasets
en.input.data_points: Please enter data points (separated by spaces):
en.input.time_points: Please enter time points (separated by spaces):
en.result.table_header: Data Point	Time Point	PG Value	W(P) Threshold	Trend
en.result.conclusion_trend: The data shows significant trend, indicating possible systematic changes in the test sample over the measured time period.
en.result.conclusion_no_trend: The data shows no significant trend, indicating the test sample remains stable over the measured time period.
en.result.test_failed: Test could not be completed successfully, possibly due to insufficient data points.
en.help.title: Help
en.help.description: Neumann Trend Test is a statistical method used to evaluate whether a dataset has systematic trends.
en.help.usage_areas: This test is commonly used in pharmaceutical stability studies and quality control fields.
en.help.guide_1: Run New Neumann Trend Test - Enter data directly and perform the test
en.help.guide_2: Load Dataset - Load previously saved datasets and perform tests
en.help.guide_3: Import Data from CSV - Import data from CSV files for testing
en.help.note_1: Neumann Trend Test requires at least 4 data points
en.help.note_2: Standard W(P) values are based on specific statistical tables for determining trend significance
en.help.note_3: If PG value is less than or equal to W(P) value, a trend is determined to exist
en.help.note_4: Default uses 95% confidence level, can be manually adjusted
en.about.title: About
en.about.description: This tool is used for performing Neumann Trend Tests, supporting data management, test execution, and result analysis.
en.about.applications: Widely applicable in pharmaceutical stability studies, quality control, and time series analysis fields.
en.load.run_test_prompt: Run Neumann Trend Test on this dataset?
en.prompt.separator_help: Use spaces or commas as separators
en.prompt.timepoint_mismatch_warning: Warning: Time point count does not match data point count, default time points will be used.
en.help.show_help: Show this help message and exit
en.error.insufficient_data: Insufficient data points, at least 4 points required
en.suggestion.title: Suggestion
en.suggestion.check_file_path: Please check if the file path is correct
en.suggestion.check_data_format: Please check if the data format is correct
en.status.goodbye: Thank you for using Neumann Trend Test Tool, goodbye!
